 2014-00532014-01-30,  ,  EC,  , 
ActHistoric Sites and Monuments Act
PrecisAppointment of JOHN ASHTON of Pictou County, Nova Scotia, to be a member of the Historic Sites and Monuments Board of Canada, as a representative of the Province of Nova Scotia, to hold office during pleasure for a period of three years.
